Applebee’s Application Online–Print Job Employment Form
Apply for Jobs at Applebee’s Online
Application for Applebee’s: Applebee’s does not provide a printable job application. If you want to get a job at Applebee’s, you must apply for employment on the website by following the link above. Full-time or part-time positions may vary depending on the location.
Interview Tips: Go to the Applebee’s job interview questions&tips page.
Available Positions at Applebee’s: Host, Hostess, Server, Bartender, Dish Washer, Carside To Go Specialist, Line Cook, Prep Cook, Broiler Cook, International Chef, Kitchen Manager, General Utility Worker, Food Expeditor, Busser, Assistant Manager, Manager, Waiter, Waitress, Customer Sales Assistant, Delivery Driver, Produce Analyst
Minimum Age to Work at Applebee’s : 18 years old (How old do you have to be to work at Applebee’s?)
Applebee’s Hours of Operation: Sun-Thurs: 11:00am-12:00am; Fri-Sat: 11:00am-1:00am
More Information: Applebee’s Job Info
Applebee's Employee Videos
Completion of the Applebee’s application opens up a wide range of employment opportunities. Entry-level kitchen jobs and full-time management careers offer Applebee’s applicants an exciting array of job openings. Apply online to make Applebee’s your next place of employment.
Applebee’s Job Opportunities The Applebee’s online application form aids prospective employees seeking a new foodservice career. Apply online to receive Applebee’s hiring consideration immediately. Complete the online Applebee’s job application to discover available restaurant industry employment opportunities.
Whether you seek an entry-level restaurant job or hope to begin a lasting foodservice career, Applebee’s Neighborhood Grill and Bar may need to begin work now. Applebee’s restaurant chain needs to fill part-time vacancies and full-time jobs and must hire entry-level workers and professional associates at many locations today. Prospective employees over 18 years of age may apply online with Applebee’s restaurants immediately. Fill out the Applebee’s employment application to find a new restaurant career.
Entry-level Applebee’s employees often begin in kitchen worker or waitstaff associate jobs. Entry-level duties include serving customers, cooking food, and completing other jobs as necessary. Professional Applebee’s workers often find managerial or administrative careers. Professional duties change according to job title, experience, and department. Professional applicants may need to meet certain education or work history requirements to receive hiring consideration.
If you start the Applebee’s online job application, you might begin earning the competitive salary and comprehensive job benefits you seek in a new restaurant career. Apply online to receive immediate Applebee’s employment consideration. Finish the Applebee’s application form to find restaurant industry jobs today.
Job Titles and Salary Information for Applebee’s Applebee’s often hire entry-level workers and professional employees as restaurant associates. The restaurant chain must fill part-time vacancies and full-time jobs across the globe. Apply online to receive Applebee’s employment consideration now. Fill out an Applebee’s job application form to find foodservice career opportunities. Applebee’s Neighborhood Grill and Bar locations must often fill the following restaurant jobs:
Waitstaff – Applebee’s needs waitresses, waiters, hosts , hostesses, and bartenders . Entry-level waitstaff job duties include serving food, taking orders, greeting guests, mixing drinks, and completing other jobs as assigned. An Applebee’s server typically earns a starting salary at or below minimum wage, but many workers receive tips, as well. Read the Applebee’s host job description to discover job duties and pay scales for Applebee’s hosting staff members. Browse the Applebee’s bartender job description to learn about bartending opportunities with the quick-casual restaurant chain. Consult the Applebee’s server job description to find out more about waiting openings with Applebee’s.
Kitchen – Kitchen jobs at Applebee’s may include chef, prep cook, line cook, dishwasher, and busser positions. Kitchen duties include preparing food, cooking, washing dishes, bussing tables, and completing other assigned tasks. Kitchen employees at Applebee’s often earn starting pay rates between minimum wage and $10 per hour, according to job title and previous experience. Take a look at the Applebee’s kitchen crew member job description .
Management – Supervisor jobs at Applebee’s include restaurant general manager, assistant manager, kitchen manager, and shift lead jobs. Applebee’s managers hire new employees, schedule workers, train associates, and oversee daily operations. An Applebee’s supervisor may receive a starting salary between $20,000 and $50,000 per year, depending on position, previous management experience, work history, and department of operations. Read the Applebee’s manager job description .
Applebee’s often needs to hire standard restaurant workers, but the company frequently needs to staff further restaurant jobs as well as corporate careers. Some Applebee’s location hire employees to fill Carside To-Go, broiler cook, food expeditor, general utility worker jobs. Applebee’s corporate offices may need to staff customer service associate, administrative assistant, or other professional jobs. Regardless of the work you seek, Applebee’s restaurants and offices may need you to begin work immediately. Apply online with Applebee’s to discover locations hiring workers today.
Applebee’s Work Benefits Applebee’s restaurants offer even a new-hire employee job benefits, like flexible scheduling, paid job training, and industry-competitive pay rates. Eligible Applebee’s workers may enjoy further employee benefits. Qualified workers with Applebee’s restaurant chain may access future planning perks, health and wellness bonuses, and further employment benefits .
Eligible Applebee’s workers receive health and wellness benefits, like healthcare options and various insurance plans. The future planning benefits offered to qualified Applebee’s employees include 401(k) retirement plan access and life insurance options. Additional Applebee’s employment benefits offer eligible associates paid time off and meal discounts. As a franchised business, Applebee’s benefits program may vary drastically between franchises. Apply online to find Applebee’s employee benefits information now.
Read more about Applebee’s benefits .

History Applebee’s Neighborhood Grill and Bar restaurants began with a single location in 1980 in Decatur, GA. Founders Bill and T.J. Palmer sold T.J. Applebee’s Rx for Edibles&Elixirs in 1983. Applebee’s began franchising shortly after the sale and changed names in 1986. Applebee’s opened a series of franchised locations. Between the early-1990s and the mid-2000s, Applebee’s opened roughly 100 new locations every year. Applebee’s operates more than 1,900 locations across the globe.
Menu Applebee’s offers a selection of American fare and a full bar at most locations. Applebee’s menu includes burgers, pasta, seafood, chicken, ribs, steak, sandwiches, soups, and salads. Applebee’s also sells dessert items and specialty coffee drinks. The drink menu at Applebee’s offers beer, wine, margaritas, sangrias, martinis, and other classic cocktails, like the Hurricane, the Mud Slide, and the Bahama Mama. Whatever you crave, Applebee’s Neighborhood Grill and Bar menu satisfies.
Community Involvement Applebee’s restaurant chain works with several national and local charitable organizations across the globe. The business supports programs caring for children and improving education. Since 2005, Applebee’s raised over $1 million for the Alex’s Lemonade Stand charity. The company donated $300,000 to Make-A-Wish Foundation and $120,000 to V Foundation for Cancer Research in 2008 alone. Applebee’s strive to give back to the communities supporting the business, and many Applebee’s franchisees work with local charities.
Environmental Applebee’s cares for the environment and works to reduce waste and energy consumption in several ways. Applebee’s recycled over 49 tons of paper products from 2007 to 2010. Applebee’s also pioneers green initiatives across the chain of restaurants. Many Applebee’s Neighborhood Grill and Bar locations utilize automatic faucets and low-flow fixtures to reduce water consumption, coordinated heat, ventilation, and air conditioning controls, energy-saving products like reduced usage light fixtures and automatic lights, and solar reflective windows.
International Applebee’s International Inc. operates both U.S. and international Applebee’s franchises. Applebee’s runs a large international business. The restaurant chain maintains hundreds of international locations in countries like Canada, Mexico, Saudi Arabia, Chile, Brazil, Singapore, Qatar, Greece, and the United Arab Emirates. Applebee’s Neighborhood Grill and Bar restaurants operate in more than 15 countries outside the U.S..
Financial Applebee’s Neighborhood Grill and Bar restaurants operates under Applebee’s International Inc. Applebee’s International exists as a wholly owned subsidiary of DineEquity Inc. DineEquity trades publicly on the NYSE under ticker symbol DIN. In addition to Applebee’s, DineEquity operates IHOP, formally International House of Pancakes, restaurants. DineEquity maintains corporate headquarters in Glendale, CA and employs more than 60,000 workers worldwide.
